document.masterDocTitle: Polychaetes from Santa Catarina State (southern Brazil): checklist and remarks on species distribution

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Polychaetes from Santa Catarina State (southern Brazil): checklist and remarks on species distribution

subSubSection.paragraph:
Species:
Magelona crenulata Bolivar & Lana 1986
References: Almeida & Vivan ( 2011 ), Almeida et al . ( 2012 ) Environment: Bay, inner continental shelf Depth: 6–12 m
Environment: Bay, coastal lagoon, estuarine beach, tidal flat, inner continental shelf

Species:
Magelona riojai Jones, 1963
References: Almeida et al. ( 2012 ) Environment: Inner continental shelf Depth: 10–12 m
Coordinates: Between 26 º 18 '- 27 º 18 ' Museum: IBUFRJ- 1127
Note: This material needs to be revised. It is probably a new species.
